Why Choose Mobitrix

Using the most technologically advanced software, Mobitrix WhatsApp Transfer is able to quickly migrate WhatsApp chat history, pictures, videos and lots more between devices with the highest success rate guaranteed.

Industry-Leading Speed

Our exclusive technology is designed to significantly accelerate transfer speed.

Success Rate

While no software can guarantee a 100% success rate, Mobitrix guarantees the highest possible success rate of 99%.

Steps to Transfer

Our software only requires you to perform 3 simple steps to transfer WhatsApp backups from one to another.

Customer Service

If you have any issues, the friendly Mobitrix support team is always on hand to provide assistance around the clock.

How to Use

  • Step 1. Connect the 2 Devices

    Open the program and connect your devices to the computer using the original USB cables

  • Step 2. Start to Transfer

    Begin the transfer process once the 2 devices have been connected by clicking ‘transfer’.

  • Step 3. Finish to Transfer WhatsApp

    All of your WhatsApp messages and attachments will soon be successfully transferred.

Supported Android Devices

Supported OS

Other

CPU: 1GHz (32 bit or 64 bit). RAM: 256 MB or more of RAM (1024MB Recommended). Hard Disk Space: 200 MB and above free space.

FAQ

  • 1. Is free trial version available before registration?

    Yes. We offer the free trial version for all the products for users to evaluate whether it is useful for them before purchase.

  • 2. How long will it take to transfer WhatsApp messages?

    The transferring time depends on the data size of the WhatsApp data to be transferred. Generally, it can be several minutes or an hour.

  • 3. What’s the Differences between the trial and full version?

    You can use the free trial version to back up WhatsApp messages. To transfer or restore WhatsApp, you will need to upgrade from trial version to full version.

  • 4.Will my device data be affected after using your software?

    No. All the data on your iPhone or Android phone will not be affected.

  • 5. Is it safe to purchase product on your website?

    Yes. It is 100% secure to purchase from our website. We guarantee that your privacy will not be disclosed when you browse our website or download and use our product.
